patthana8.35:4.1: Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.35:4.2: Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.35:4.3: Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacitto ca nanocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.35:5.1: Nanocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.35:6.1: Nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
